abilities.name: Source.
abilities.description: tales from the yawning portal,  page 242

abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Keen Smell.
abilities.description: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
abilities.description: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

abilities.name: Swimming Leap.
abilities.description: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.
